resources.string: The debt / credit status is your general debt situation within the various groups. It is used to notify you immediately if you are indebted to someone or need to receive credit in even one group.
Don\'t worry, you don\'t have any debt! This is an example group to help you understand how our app works. As soon as you log in this group will disappear and you can create new ones.
I\'m sorry, but you need to log in or register, if you haven\'t done so already, to see the content of this page.

La password deve contenere almeno:
 • 1 lettera maiuscola
 • 1 numero
 • 1 carattere speciale tra: [!,@,#,$,%,^,&,+,=,]
 • Nessuno spazio bianco
